answers.answer: Hello,you also may need to ask your doctor for a referral to a diabetes educator.If you are into books, following are some excellent ones that my help/1.  Think Like A Pancreas.2. Diabetes Solutions.Both have recent editions in the past years.You can learn how to control your diabetes.If your sugars are super high and don't come down with your insulin, say in the 300s, then you should go to the hospital and ask for assistance.
